name: ProcessStockMutationFile
description:
Processes a (delta)stock mutation file.

Expected format of the file is JSON with the following markup:

```
[
  {
    "ProductID": [Optional, int],
    "ProductBackendID": [Optional, string],
    "QuantityOnHand": [Required, int, value >= 0]
  },
  ...
]
```

Mutation will only be processed for valid ProductIDs or ProductBackendIDs. In case ProductID and ProductBackendID are provided,
ProductBackendID will be selected as the search parameter.
